code: import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useContext}from"react";import Context from"../../Context/Context";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SelectionCard(){const navigate=useNavigate();const{setSortingState}=useContext(Context);const changeAlgo=algo=>{setSortingState(prev=>({...prev,algorithm:algo}));};let text="Selection sort is a sorting algorithm that sorts an array by repeatedly finding the minimum element from the unsorted part of the array and moving it to the beginning of the array. The algorithm starts by finding the minimum element from the entire array and swapping it with the first element.
